post.text: With just days to go until the election, Republicans are pulling out all the stops to try to bring Hillary down. Share this to help set the record straight and get out the facts.

comment.author: Hatice
comment.text: Shelby 3-sides to every story, smh this election is a mess tho, one side to that truth.

replies.author: Shelby
replies.text: Totally !! But trump didn't pull out all the stops on this , the FBI did . The term used was "pertinent" info. I'm sorry but she is in an open investigation right now , guilty or not it is a HUgE conflict of interest.

replies.author: Hatice
replies.text: Shelby but the way I'm hearing it, it's not her that's being investigated, they were investigating something else and her emails are on the same terminal. I was out of town yesterday and didn't pay close attention but is that not correct? I understood it as say ur Dentist is doing allegedly illegal stuff and you got caught up in some of the transactions and ur being investigated b/c he is.

replies.author: Shelby
replies.text: To be fair I think they need to say what they found but they also shouldn't put the investigation at risk by doing so. I would like to believe they wouldn't do this unless it was serious but Hatice I don't know what to believe anymore

replies.author: Shelby
replies.text: Hatice Astondèbondé yes you are correct they were looking at something else BUT they were looking into one of her closest aides servers. If she was sharing classified info to her about whatever it is a national security risk and punishable by law.

replies.author: Shelby
replies.text: Now that's not to say it is what they found I'm just saying it involves Hillary ! Maybe they didn't find everything on Hillarys server or because she deleted it all but now they found it on someone else's
